long_description: The redesigned Black Diamond Axis 33 Pack is a zippered, top-loading hauler engineered for comfort on rock, ice and fast alpine climbs. Its supportive suspension offers impressive freedom of movement. ergoACTIV(TM) suspension offers full range of motion and optimal comfort for scrambling and climbing. SwingArm(TM) shoulder straps move in concert with a hiker's stride or a climber's reach by sliding through the bottom of the pack with a low-friction cable and housing. Hipbelt padding can be removed to strip the pack down to the fixed webbing hipbelt. Thermoformed back panel is vented to maximize breathability. Top-loading main compartment features a zip closure with a tuck-away helmet holder and rope strap. The hydration-compatible Black Diamond Axis 33 Pack features a reservoir sleeve and drink tube exit port (reservoir sold separately). Ice tool PickPockets(TM), 3-point haul system and 20mm crampon straps accommodate climbing gear; side compression straps take up extra volume and stabilize your load.
short_description: The redesigned Black Diamond Axis 33 Pack is a zippered, top-loading hauler engineered for comfort on rock, ice and fast alpine climbs. Its supportive suspension offers impressive freedom of movement.
